title: ‘I Can Make a Big Step Closer to Tadej and Jonas’: Evenepoel at 2024 Tour Level Starting Critérium du Dauphiné
content:
Huge battle with Pogačar and Vingegaard in store, with Remco Evenepoel in a determined mood: ‘I’m here with ambition.’

Read the full article at ‘I Can Make a Big Step Closer to Tadej and Jonas’: Evenepoel at 2024 Tour Level Starting Critérium du Dauphiné on Velo.
author: sstokes
